name: search_by_title
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mdblist.
Tool description: Get Movies and TV Shows data with ratings from multiple providers in JSON format
API description: Search for Movies or TV Shows by title, with optional filters for year, media type, and limit on the number of results.

s.description: The title of the Movie or TV Show to search for.

l.description: The maximum number of items to return. Accepts values from 1 to 100. Defaults to None.

y.description: The year to filter the search results (format YYYY). This will also include movies from the previous and next year. Defaults to None.

m.description: Filter by media type, either 'movie' or 'tv show'. Leave empty for both. Defaults to None.
